name: Asuka 120% LimitOver BURNING Fest
overview: "Limit Over" is a 1999 unofficial hack of Asuka 120% Limited, commonly rumored to have been made by the original development team after the company disbanded. A substantial overhaul of the original game, it polishes all of the game’s mechanics, adds new ones, introduces new character moves, and re-balances every character. In many ways, it’s the definitive Asuka 120%.
